page.title: 01PENZANCE - INFORMATION
page.content: Penzance is a{coastal town}in the SouthWest of Cornwall.It has a harbour and dry-dock,and trips on the Scillonion to the Isles of Scilly.It has a large railway terminal which is the last stop in Britain.In Penzance there are alot of shops.Some are big such as Tesco,Woolworth,Knees and Parkers.The area surrounding Penzance is farmland.It is intensively managed grassland and crops other than grass .People come to Penzance for a holiday because it is quiet,clean,and most of the time it is sunny. Alv. Penzance is 350 years old and was originally called Pensans which means holy headland.The railway came to Penzance in 1904 and started the tourist industry.The Town Hall is St. John's Hall.It was built in 1864 and cost Â£13000.Penzance is a{market town (cont.)
